subtitle: Sudoku, no adds just play
description:
Play Sudoku the way it's meant to be – clean, fast, and distraction-free. In this simple and straight forward - yet challenging - game of Sudoku you solve sudoku puzzles at your own pace. No ads. No clutter. Just pure logic and focus. No coins, no pop-ups, no nonsense.

Just quick, satisfying puzzles in a calm interface.

Play Together
If you choose to play a multiplayer game, you share the same board with your opponents and race against them in real time. Perfect for playing side by side – same puzzle, same timer, fair game. See who solves the puzzles first.

No Hidden Costs
One low price. No subscriptions. No ads.
Just Sudoku, done right.

For Every Skill Level
Easy, medium, or hard puzzles – choose your challenge.
Great for beginners or seasoned Sudoku players.
keywords: sudoku, puzzle, no ads, sudoku multiplayer, shared board sudoku, soduko 2 player, simple sudoku,
whatsNew: The app is now faster than ever and we've fixed a few bugs that you may have experienced.
promotionalText: Free for a limited time only! Offer ends on December 1st, 2025.
